Help:Node.title: go
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: go [direction] ; go [exit]
EXAMPLE: go north ; go purple door
Allows you to leave a room in a specific direction. All directions can be abbreviated. Common directions are: n, ne, e, se, s, sw, w, nw, up, and down. Also supports moving through exits, such as doors, portals, and gates.
SEE ALSO: ,
